field_list:
the name of the addressee
Is the addressee likely a person or a legal entity
subject of the letter
PATH authorization number
the proposed activities, separated by a semicolon
the impact of each of the activities
the size of the impact if it is listed
result of the review decision
name of the person writing the letter
user_prompt: This is a letter of authorization.  in these letters, DFO formally acknowledges receipt of a proponent's proposal to conduct works or activities on a waterway. it outlines the result of a review determining whether this work may cause damage to fish or fish habitat, and whether proposed mitigation measures are sufficient to prevent such harm. It provides a decision on the request and advises the proponent of their obligations under the authorization.  Based on this description, extract the fields above from the full text of the letter.
